definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to act rashly/to act precipitously regardless of the consequences/reckless/foolhardy/daredevil
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
barbarian/slave servant/(old) contemptuous term for people from southern China (used by northern Chinese people)

sentences.english: B : Uh-huh, I like the trees and plants and the landscaping of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 是呀，我觉得学校还蛮用心维护植物和校园景观的。

sentences.english: Jaco: That's an old one but a good one.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影蛮老的啊，不过很不错。

sentences.english: That's an old one but a good one.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影蛮老的啊，不过很不错。

sentences.english: Braveheart is a good movie, but it is slow in some parts.
sentences.chinese: 《英雄本色》是一部好电影，可是有些部份蛮沉闷的。

sentences.english: It would be interesting to hear what their rationalizations are.
sentences.chinese: 听听他们合理化的做法也是一件蛮有趣味的事情。

sentences.english: But at the same time, they're pretty relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 但与此同时，他们也蛮放松。

sentences.english: Betrayed by his friends, nearly to death.
sentences.chinese: 曾因同伴背叛险些丧命，后为蛮幽王所救。

sentences.english: It's something where there is a really heavy thing based at one corner, and there's a lot of dials and gauges and everything.
sentences.chinese: 它是有一个角的蛮沉的东西，而且有很多仪表和表盘。

sentences.english: Benny and Blanca own the corner store. They're okay except don't lean on the candy counter.
sentences.chinese: 他们还蛮好，可只是靠在糖果柜台上时才对你好。

sentences.english: Cold stream stripping logging pecking, songbirds Liu Xiao cord quite high.
sentences.chinese: 伐木清溪寒剥啄，鸣禽高柳晓缗蛮。

sentences.english: It was a short walk from the Tai Wai East Rail MTR Station, and the shopfront is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 从大围地铁站行走一小段路，店面可是蛮可观的。

sentences.english: And this is very much relevant.
I thellonk we two really click.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉咱们两个蛮投契的。

sentences.english: Megan, with a red face said calmly.
sentences.chinese: 梅金虽然红起了脸，但是说这话的时候还蛮镇定的。

sentences.english: They're okay except don't lean on the candy counter.
sentences.chinese: 他们还蛮好，可只是靠在糖果柜台上时才对你好。

sentences.english: Hope everyone enjoyed d show, it sure looked like they did.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家都喜欢昨天的演出，看上去大家都蛮尽兴的。

to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
